name: RAM 1982
description:
A fast-paced retro sci-fi online PvP game. Step into a virtual prison and help your gang mine precious RAM blocks for the corporation - but beware, other gangs will be competing against you to do the same!

Key Features


  • Join a match and be instantly thrown into the mayhem with other players from around the world
  • Compete against 3 other teams to see who can collect the most RAM
  • Use your pickaxe to mine RAM blocks, or brutally attack other prisoners to steal theirs
  • Beware the merciless prison guards who won't hesitate to shoot troublemakers
  • Use healing stations to regenerate and stay in the fight
